properties.entry: SELECT MV_NO , MV_NAME , MV_OPENDATE , MV_STORY , FPAGE_EXPOSED , MPAGE_EXPOSED , MV_POSTER , MV_PREVIEW , MV_STATUS FROM MOVIE WHERE MV_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MOVIE WHERE MV_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_DATE, M.VIEW_RATING, M.MV_OPENDATE, LISTAGG(C.CATEGORY_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.CATEGORY_NAME) AS CATEGORY_NAMES FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_CATEGORY MC ON MC.MV_NO = M.MV_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON MC.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE M.MV_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_DATE, M.VIEW_RATING, M.MV_OPENDATE ORDER BY M.MV_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_DATE, M.VIEW_RATING, M.MV_OPENDATE, LISTAGG(C.CATEGORY_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.CATEGORY_NAME) AS CATEGORY_NAMES FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_CATEGORY MC ON MC.MV_NO = M.MV_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON MC.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE MV_STATUS = 'Y' AND MV_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' GROUP BY M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_DATE, M.VIEW_RATING, M.MV_OPENDATE ORDER BY M.MV_NO DESC
UPDATE MOVIE SET MV_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MV_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET FILE_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REF_TYPE IN (1 ,2) AND REF_NO = ?

SELECT M.MV_NO , M.MV_NAME , M.MV_OPENDATE , M.MV_NATION , M.MV_RTIME , M.MV_STORY , M.FPAGE_EXPOSED , M.VIEW_RATING , M.CURRENT_SCREENING , M.MV_POSTER , M.MV_PREVIEW , LISTAGG(C.CATEGORY_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.CATEGORY_NAME) AS CATEGORY_NAMES , NM.NM_USER_REQUEST , NM.MEM_NO , NM.ADMIN_NO FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_CATEGORY MC ON MC.MV_NO = M.MV_NO LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON MC.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN NO_MOVIE_ENROLL NM ON NM.NM_TITLE = M.MV_NAME WHERE M.MV_NO = ? GROUP BY M.MV_NO, M.MV_NAME, M.MV_OPENDATE, M.MV_NATION, M.MV_RTIME, M.MV_STORY, M.FPAGE_EXPOSED, M.VIEW_RATING, M.CURRENT_SCREENING, M.MV_POSTER, M.MV_PREVIEW, NM.NM_USER_REQUEST, NM.MEM_NO, NM.ADMIN_NO ORDER BY M.MV_NO DESC
SELECT P_NO, P_NAME, CASTING, P_JOB, P_BD, P_NATION, P_FILE, MOVIE_NO FROM PERSON JOIN CASTING ON P_NO = PERSON_NO WHERE MOVIE_NO = ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_STATUS FROM CATEGORY
UPDATE CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_STATUS = 'N' WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = ?
INSERT INTO CATEGORY ( CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_DATE , CATEGORY_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CATEGORY_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
UPDATE CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_NAME = ? WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A, * FROM( SELECT P_NO , P_NAME , P_JOB , P_BD , P_NATION , P_FILE FROM PERSON )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
